attributes.action: instruct the Treasury and BERR to release the business case analysis for opening the UK Universal Mail service to competition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the proceedings planning the legislation to open the Post Offices Universal Mail service to competition it is a logical assumption that either the Treasury and or the BERR analysed the potential effects of such a action on the services provided to areas outside the major population centres.  The Prime Minister should direct the Treasury to release any documents pertaining to such discussions, to provide confidence that Ministers were fully advised of the possible consequences of opening the sub-£1 postal market to full competition.
